column2: Oh hey Ross oh I'm so glad someone's here could\n  you zip me up?"
sure.'

no, no, no there's nothing wrong with you I mean you\n  don't strike me as the type of person that wants to get married anyway."

what a great dinner.'

oh no yeah, no Phoebe is great, but umm I'm an idiot\n  look right before you guys went out I accidentally got her all upset."
that's why she was weird."
yes, yeah I said something stupid about her never\n  having had a serious relationship, but you should know she is so much fun,\n  a wonderful person please don't blow her off."
I'm not blowing her off, I actually just got off the\n  phone with her, were going out tomorrow night, I mean I hope that's ok with\n  you stranger from the coffee house."
well then I didn't need to bother you or the four\n  other Mike Hanagens I bothered."
hey wait wait wait wait wait! Is that true what you\n  said Phoebe's never had a serious relationship?"
of course she has. if she'd never had a serious relationship\n  I'd go round broadcasting it like some unstoppable moron."
